pkgmetadata.longdescription: Describe Pedigree Relationships in Words // Describe in words the genealogical relationship between two members of a given pedigree. 'verbalisr' is part of the 'ped suite' collection of packages for pedigree analysis. For a demonstration of 'verbalisr', see the online app 'QuickPed' at https://magnusdv.shinyapps.io/quickped.
